credit_line: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
title: Design for a chandelier
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and wash, on cream laid paper
description:
Center element consists of a quiver filled with arrows supported by four ropes. Four arms, with flowing candles, are decorated with flower clusters and a garland. Flower clusters are entwined around the quiver. 
Scale at bottom, pen and black ink: 2 pieds.
name: drawing
